h1_title: Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Elder Jinchi
content: He can also perform the palm blast wave after charging up, only Jinchi will also summon all of the wandering spirits to increase the power of his blast and delay its attack, which you’ll really want to be careful to dodge at the right time.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_1_Secret-Ancient_Guanyin_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Elder Jinchi'.
The content is as follows:
He can also perform the palm blast wave after charging up, only Jinchi will also summon all of the wandering spirits to increase the power of his blast and delay its attack, which you’ll really want to be careful to dodge at the right time.
